name: Comicvine Remix
description: The relaunched Comicvine design is very nice but personally I don't like green so this style replaces everything green with a large focus on blues and grays. This script was designed for use with the official CV light skin but it should work fairly well with the dark skin.
additional_info:
Version History:

v1.0 - Initial release, next version will be out in the next week or so as I test it for bugs and condense the code.

v1.0.1 - Styled a few things I had initially missed.

v1.0.2 - Made a couple of changes for the new notification system, I also changed the ugly flag icon. Fixed image comment link colors. Also made it so the issue cover action buttons only show up when you are hovering over the cover so the cover art isn't obscured. Probably added a few other things.

v1.1 - Fixed an annoying search drop down bug. I also removed the three column issue association code as the hard coded value was not good for users with low resolutions.

v1.1.1 - Forgot to modify a feature from v1.1.

v1.2 - Changed the active date color for the date picker. Finally replaced the Giant Bomb loading gif for the wiki, hopefully this officially gets changed soon cause embedding this replacement gif increases the script size a lot.

Known Bugs:

When editing in the wiki or a post links show as red, for some reason I can't force the tinymce editor to use my code instead of its own :(

When on the front page and using the CV dark theme the issue reviews sidebar text becomes unreadable on mouse-over.
